price: Оё ба шумо хабар диҳам, ки шаётин бар чи касе нозил мешаванд?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
